hackathon-description-text: We want to ignite the spark of co-operation between the developers, representatives of education industry and large corporations. We want to prove that in a short time you can build awesome services and products. We want to demonstrate that using the high-speed design and development process you can create products not just "for her/for him," but also "with him/with her". With all this we do not want to forget about adding some entertainment to our activities. We believe that true happiness comes from joy of creation.
